vin.description: minimum input voltage under which the part can be expected to operate without the output dropping

vout.description: output voltage the part can regulate

feedbackVoltage.description: voltage comparison point at the feedback node (vref)

loadCurrent.description: load current supported by a device

currentLimit.description: sustained output current threshold beyond which the output of a device starts drooping

voutAccuracy.description: output voltage variation at no load of a device

loadRegulation.description: output voltage variation,from no load to full load, of a device

lineRegulation.description: output voltage variation,from minimum input voltage to maximum input voltage, of a device

enableTime.description: time between enable asserted and output voltage rising to 10% nominal

rampTime.description: time for output voltage to go from 10% vout nominal to 90% vout nominal

powerSupplyRejectionRatio.description: graph object to capture Power Supply Rejection Ratio (PSRR) of device as a function of frequency

rmsOutputNoise.description: graph object to capture RMS output noise of device as a function of frequency

totalOutputNoise.description: total output noise of a device

currentConsumption.description: current used by device in various power modes

componentProtectionThresholds.description: thermal and power supply protection thresholds of a device
